1.content: Now, who should get chubby?
1.title: Welcome to the Velvet Room.

11.content: Should we focus on Minato Arisato or Minako Arisato?
11.title: Minato Arisato/Minako Arisato

choices: His big appetite is starting to catch up with him
111.content: Why has Minato been getting fat?
111.title: Minato Arisato

1112.content:
Minato had always been slightly chubby in his childhood. When Minato had joined S.E.E.S and become its field leader, all the money Minato earned had to go somewhere which eventually went towards food. This led to Minato gaining weight at a much quicker pace. Minato now sported a chubby face that was verging on gaining a second chin, which was accompanied by two pinchable cheeks. Minato's arms were slowly growing from the increased weight which sightly stretched out his highschool uniform; Minato's legs were in the same predicament, with two thighs that grew to slowly get closer to one another. Minato's stomach was small, but was now gaining traction. It would push his uniform shirt to its limit, to the point where his shirt showed every curve.

Minato couldn't care for his increased weight; in fact, he relished in it, and so did the rest of S.E.E.S. Minato actually enjoyed gaining weight and wished to gain more as shown by his current predicament.

Minato had made his way downstairs to grab a "snack". This was a common occurrence. Minato was currently in some too small pajama pants that hugged his shapely legs and ass plus an ill fitting shirt that constantly rose up after a couple steps. Minato was stuffing himself with some pasta he had lazily cooked, when he heard footsteps coming from the stairs. When Minato looked over he saw...
1112.title: Cubby chased

11121.content:
"You know, if you're gonna stuff yourself you should at least do it with something well-made." Yukari teased, dressed in her pink pajamas. The brunette had come down for a little snack herself.

"It tastes fine." Minato flatly stated. "And didn't you burn something so badly not even Koromaru ate it?"

"Hey, I've gotten a lot better at cooking since then. Why don't I cook us something and prove it you?" The archer suggested.

"Sure, go ahead." Minato said before eat some more of his pasta.

"You're still going to finish that, aren't you?"

"Yeah."

Yukari wasn't surprised, her friend was truly a glutton. On more then one occasion she had been truly astounded by how much Minato in one sitting, and how big his stuffed gut would get as a result. It was no wonder that he had gotten so fat lately.

As Yukari cooked the pasta, she couldn't help but think about her friend's big belly. When they first met, it was only a little chubby, not enough to catch Yukari's attention. But now it was a soft ball of fat that would jiggle with every step. Yukari would often find herself staring at the sphere of jiggly fat. Even while exploring Tartarus she would sometimes sneak a peak.

The brunette imagined herself in her room rubbing an obese Minato's massive stuffed belly as he let out gigantic belches, the archer having just finished stuffing him to the brim with a massive meal.. Minato has a nice, big jiggly belly, huge man boobs that rested on his gut, very chubby legs that rubbed together, chunky arms connected to meaty hands, a big bubblebutt that had broken chairs, and an adorable fat face with chubby cheeks and a double chin.

His bloated gut had snapped his belt in half and popped off the button on his pants. The resulting avalanche of belly fat that came out forced his zipper all the way down, exposing some of his underwear. Minato's big belly had forced his shirt to ride up to just below his flabby chest,
leaving his massive gut completely exposed

Yukari then imagined Minato letting out a burp so massive that it caused the many empty plates once filled with food and even the room itself to shake. Minato's belly even jiggled from the force of his belch.

"Well excuse you!" Yukari playfully said as she gave Minato's belly a few affectionate pats before she resumed rubbing the giant orb.

"It's a little too -URP- late for that. UUUURRRP!" Minato remarked.

Yukari snapped herself out of her thoughts. She immediately decided she would just write it off as some weird dream and resolved to forget about it.

A giant belch Minato released caught Yukari's attention. Yukari looked over at him to see that he had just finished the bowl of pasta he made. The chubby bluenette was leaning back in his seat, resting a hand on his slightly bigger stomach.

"Well excuse you!" Yukari playfully said.

Yukari finished cooking their pasta shortly after. She had made enough to fill up two huge bowls, one for each of them.

"Here you go." Yukari said as she placed the bowls on the table in front of the couch and then sat next to Minato. "Let's dig in."
11121.title: Yukari

11123.content: Is it Aigis? No doubt she's concerned about Minato's status. Is he getting too many calories, or not enough?
11123.title: Aigis?

1113.content: Why has Minato gotten so fat?
1113.title: Another reason

choices: Aigis grows interested in Minato's belly and belches
Aigis decides to gain weight herself
Yukari takes Minato out on a dinner date
11132.content:
Minato moaned, finishing another slice of delicious cake even as his aching stomach begged him to stop. He really did want to stop and let his belly rest but he just couldn't turn down any of Aigis' cooking after she had gone to the trouble of baking them for him. Plus they tasted really good.

The bluenette and Aigis were in the former's room, Aigis had baked a huge feast for Minato. This was a common thing for them now. Aigis had grown interested in cooking once she learned about how cooking for someone was considered a sign of friendship or even love. Hoping this would help her understand humans more, Aigis started to learn how to cook, with Minato being her taste tester. It didn't take too long for the android to become a skilled cook.

However, Aigis did not know what the size of an average meal was for someone like Minato. Her meals initially started out small, as she knew to start with simple and small stuff, but as she grew more skilled and comfortable with cooking, the portions greatly increased. Of course, eating so much caused Minato to balloon up.

Minato has a large belly that always strained the buttons on his school uniform shirt when it wasn't popping them, which often happened during a good meal. The big ball of fat was very soft, which was why Aigis loved feeling it so much. This also meant that it could serve as a nice spot to rest one's head. Minato's big belly hung down and was very jiggly, bobbing and bouncing with every step like it was made of jello, a sight the female members of S.E.E.S. found distracting for reasons they couldn't really explain. His gut would get especially jiggly during gym class or when he was fighting shadows. Love handles and rolls had formed on the sides of his dome of a middle and were deep enough to fit some small objects in. His bellybutton had grown so deep that it looked like a dark cave and was often visible when he binged.

The blunette's chest had turned into a pair of flabby moobs, they were big enough that the bluenette could cup them in his hands. Minato could even fill up a bra with his moobs. Having such big moobs would sometimes cause Minato to be mistaken for a girl. Just like his big tummy, Minato's chest was very jiggly and soft. Yukari had taken to teasing Minato about his chest by calling them his breasts, much to his chagrin. It was because of Minato growing such a flabby chest that Aigis learned what moobs were.

The persona user's ass was humongous, each cheek was a malleable sphere the size of a volleyball. It strained his pants, not just because of the size but also because all the jiggling his butt did when he ran had caused many rips in many pairs of pants. His ass lifted him up by a full inch whenever he sat down and left a noticeable imprint on the dorm's couches when he sat down on one, which he always did when he came home after school, unless of course he didn't go straight to his room to play a video game.

His legs were meaty and wide, rubbing together whenever he walked or sat down, with barely any separation otherwise. All the jostling and wobbling the bluenette's legs did when he walked highlighted how badly out of shape Minato had become. He was never a fan of all the walking and running he had to do in Tartarus but getting so out of shape made the experience even more unbearable.

Minato's face was much more round and chubby. His face had pretty much no angles to it, with cute chubby cheeks and a double chin. All this new found fat caused Minato to appear much more friendly, a stark contrast to how quiet and uninterested he used to usually look. This led to some friendly teasing from Yukari, which she sometimes liked to emphasize by pinching his round cheeks.

"UUURRP! Excuse me. Sorry about that, Aigis." Minato said to his friend after he finished his slice of cake.

"There is no need to apologize, belching helps your stomach feel better." Aigis replied, already cutting Minato another slice.

"If you say so." Aigis had already told Minato that he should belch a few times throughout the course of their many taste testing sessions, though Minato would still sometimes instinctively apologize for his bursts of gas.

Minato looked down at his big belly, the large mass was taking up most of his vision as he did so. He had been fat for a while now yet there was still some times where he would look at his belly and be surprised by how massive it was.

"Looks like it's only going to get bigger and bigger for now." Minato thought as he dug in to the new slice of cake Aigis gave him.

Minato unleashed a massive belch when he finally finished eating the many sweets Aigis had prepared for him that night, a fitting way to signal the end of his feast. His gut was an even massive sphere of fat now and completely took up his lap, even going a little past it. He had to undo the buttons on his shirt and pants, as well as his belt and zipper to make room for the gigantic orb, lest it just force them off.

"Thanks again -UUURRRAP- for the meal, Aigis." Minato burped out. "It was great like al -URP- ways."

'I am glad you enjoy it so much." Aigis replied. "Would you like me to engage in rubbing your belly again?"

"Yeah, -UUUUURP- thanks." Minato always loved it when Aigis rubbed his stuffed gut after every binge.

Aigis placed her hands on Minato's stuffed gut and started moving them in soothing and gentle motions in it's blubbery surface, which felt absolutely heavenly to the bloated bluenette. Despite being a robot, Aigis' hands felt as warm as any other human's. All the rubs caused Minato to emit quite a few loud belches, which went along perfectly with the massage in soothing his stomach. Aigis also kneaded Minato's tummy, which at one point caused the obese bluenette to let out a really big burp.

"UUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRP! Oof."

"I believe that was your biggest belch within the previous 24 hours."
11132.title: Sweet Food and Sweet Belly Rubs

choices: Her big appetite is starting to catch up with her
112.content: Why has Minako been getting fat?
112.title: Minako Arisato

1121.content:
Ever since moving to the island, Minako had an urge to... eat. All she would do was eat, even during the dark hour! She would hand out food to her fellow members like it was trick or treat night! Even when all she received was a slight scratch from a shadow, she would eat an entire loaf of bread or a Wild Duck Burger! Speaking of, any time she could, she would be seen at Wild Duck Burger stuffing her face with everything on the menu. She simply couldn't help herself and it was definitely showing on her figure. What was once a nice slender girl when arriving, was now a girl with love handles and chins like no other. Almost every step she took, the ground around her shook and she didn't seem to mind nor care. It was amazing she could still do just as much as her fellow members during the dark hour with how much fat she had to carry around on her!

         Fuuka's cooking didn't help Minako either. Every batch of cookies Fuuka would make, Minako would eat it all, even if it wasn't all that amazingly made. As for Shinjiro's cooking, Minako would down her portion and ask for seconds before anyone else could even thank Shinji for the food! After about four months into her binging, Minako stepped on a scale to see how much she weighed.

Was it...
1121.title: Her big appetite is starting to catch up with her!

choices: Asked Aigis to see if she can be like the machine in her dream!
Went to Wild Duck Burger to stuff her face full of food!
11213.content:
Ms. Arisato was stunned to see her poundage spelled out to her! She knew she wasn't as mobile as she had been before but, 500 pounds?! That was ridiculous! She looked in the mirror and at her face. She didn't know what to think, but of course, when she didn't know what to think and was upset, she went right to food. She went down the stairs to the kitchen of the dorm and started eating everything in sight. She didn't know how to deal with this sadness that had slowly crept in so, the only way she knew how to deal with things was to eat, and boy did she eat.

         The kitchen had just been restocked earlier today, courtesy of the Kirijo group, and an entire week's worth of food for 8 people, a dog, and a robot was a lot indeed. In only a matter of minutes, a fourth of the pantry was gone into Minako's stomach. She simply sat on the couch in the lounge across the TV with lots and lots of empty bags around her and plenty of potato chip crumbs all over her shirt and face. She just kept shoving handfuls and handfuls of food into her mouth as she kept watching TV. Luckily, Minako had decided not to go to the dark hour this night so no one was up as late as she was.

         After her run of eating now almost half of the entire food stock for the week, she had finally decided she was full and went back up to her room. This time she weighed herself again and she was now 510 pounds! She had gained 10 entire pounds in just one binge! She was know even more distraught and simply didn't know what to do. However, she knew that the pantry was already low so, she simply decided to go to sleep. During this sleep, she had a dream where she would get her face stuffed and stuffed by a machine that was feeding her constant extremely fattening foods. She got so fat she couldn't even move! However, when she woke up, she was back in her room and out of her dream, although, she had an idea.

She walked out of her room and...
11213.title: 500 pounds!

112131.content:
After being asked such a weird task, Aigis was shocked! She suggested that Ms. Arisato goes on a diet instead, or else she could be a burden on the team. Minako, being the stubborn girl that she is, refused to do something as low as going on a diet and suggested the idea to Aigis again. Whether it be her loyalty to Ms. Arisato, or her programming, Aigis, after a bit of time, agreed to Minako's terms. However, they couldn't do it in the dorm, as the messiness and the noise could disrupt others, even though that never stopped Minako before. Aigis suggested they go to Yakushima, where the food supply is much greater there, and can even be replenished if needed. Plus, if Minako were to want to do this for a long period of time, she would need medical care, along with lots of sciencey things to help her, even if the feeder was just Aigis.

         During the night, Aigis and Minako would get a boat ride to Yakushima and Aigis would start feeding Minako at superhuman speeds, making Minako both happy and larger by the minute. With lots of medical and science help at the base in Yakushima, Minako nor Aigis were in much trouble of overdoing anything, as such Minako was free to eat and eat and eat and eat and eat like she always had. Her waist got larger and larger, along with her already plump and sausage-like finger becoming even more so. Her fat cheeks, both on the front and rear of her were quite apparent, and her breasts weren't anything to scoff at either. They were past double F's and were more like double K's! Plus, her waist was about 2 entire feet in front of her! While her stomach probably got the brunt of it all, her butt cheeks weren't light either. They were like two overstuffed, full-sized bean bag chairs that you could fit two people onto! It was amazing that Yakushima even had clothes that fit her as well as they did, even with Aigis continuing to feed Minako to the point of bursting every night now. Of course, this translated on Minako's ability to do everyday things. She now needed help with almost everything except walking, which with how she shook the ground with every step she took, she now shook every chair, desk, table, anything with each step she would pound on the ground. Some people at Gekkoukan even joked about her even maybe breaking through the floor!

         However, back to the nights of feeding, Aigis was starting to get into a rhythm of feeding Minako. Aigis even started to like Minako's plump figure, even if it was quite... non-mobile. After just 3 weeks from starting the feeding, Minako needed help walking, as her legs were just too plump. After a morning routine, that had now become half of Aigis' job, Minako stepped onto what was now a special scale given to the two by scientists and Yakushima and it read...
112131.title: Aigis becomes a feeder!

choices: Minako had made it to weighing a ton... and more!
Aigis surpassed Minako's weight and became a ton herself!
1121312.content:
Minako stepped off the scale, with Aigis' help of course, and instead of looking stunned like she had in the past... she looked happy. She had become at peace with her growing and even wanted to grow further. She wanted to be the biggest girl on the planet, and nothing was going to stop her. As Minako's journey went on, the rest of SEES carried on without Minako or Aigis at their side, which was quite the blow to their overall team but, with all their powers together, the rest of the group was unstoppable, even to Strega! Junpei and Yukari even supported Minako's journey, with the rest of SEES not really understanding it, but definitely also supporting it on the downside. In fact, Minako's stuffing had started to rub off on the rest of SEES! They all were slightly letting themselves go, even Akihiko, the protein junkie himself, was getting a little flabby. However, the person besides Minako who was the flabbiest was actually Aigis! Aigis was starting to get jealous that Minako was the big one out of everyone, and she requested that the scientists make her a bigger chassis.

         It didn't take long for the scientists to do so, after all, a robot that not only had a bigger figure, to begin with, but one that could eat and grow as she ate was quite the marvelous and ground-breaking technology that they had only dreamed of studying on! So, as every one night Minako got bigger and bigger, so did Aigis. Along with feeding Minako, Aigis also started to feed herself. Her chassis wasn't even half of what Minako's had now become but, just like Minako herself, it wasn't anything to simply scoff at. Aigis's robot body was getting harder to cover with her uniform at school, as she had to order many sizes above what she had previously. Luckily though, she was able to pull it off.

         After only a month and a half of constant every night feeding, Minako was getting to become more or less immobile as she got closer and closer to weighing a literal ton. Her breasts were now double Z's, her face almost unrecognizable with how plump it was, her legs looking like plus-sized roosters, her arms looking like giraffe necks, her hands and feet looking like blown up gloves, her butt cheeks looking like two entire couches, and her belly, whew, if you could see anything of her, it was her belly as it was an entire 6 feet from one side to the other. Minako was quite the sight to behold and her bodies ability to scarf down food like a madwoman was insane. The Yakushima scientists even had to make a machine that helped them collect food from around the island just to feed both Minako and her robot assistant. As for Aigis, she was about 600 pounds and looked like Minako did when she was that big! Aigis was even starting to look like she might need help lugging her body around, but the number of stabilizers inside of her was more than enough to keep her mobile, even if she surpassed a ton. Aigis would even lay on Minako's incredibly soft body as that was the only way to get to Minako's mouth and feed her. Aigis was starting to become in love with all the fat that not only surrounded her but surrounded Minako as well.

         Eventually though, one day...
1121312.title: 850 pounds!

choices: Minako and Aigis kept gaining, outgrowing the lab!
Minako thought about SEES and decided to stop.
11213121.content:
One fateful day, Minako had finally made it to weighing a ton! The excitement on her face was quite immeasurable. It was around here when she finally became immobile, however, that didn't mean she would stop eating. Even after her accomplishment of weighing a ton, Aigis still kept on feeding the huge hunk of woman. Minako's breasts were now two, full-size beach balls, both being way past ZZ's. Her butt was the same, seemingly able to crush even the largest of couches in its way. Now, of course, her mid-section was the biggest of her, being nearly the size of a common living room, and still growing! Aigis, along with stuffing the now immobile teenager, was stuffing herself too! Aigis was starting to have trouble even feeding Minako, as Aigis' own fluff and girth was getting in the way of getting food to Minako's mouth. However, the scientists at Yakushima had made an invention that would help both Minako and Aigis gain without either of them doing any work. Two hoses were connected to the teenager and the robot, both filled with an extremely fattening liquid that not only could pack on the pounds in seconds, but tasted amazing too! The Yakushima scientists turned the machines on, and both the robot and the teenager started to really pack on the pounds!

          In mere seconds, Minako was already ten pounds heavier than before, and it was showing too! Both her and Aigis were like two of the worlds largest bean-bag chairs, and with how many curves and love handles the two had, you would think their sides were racetracks, curving this way and that! Minako was content with gaining this way, and Aigis was right there with her. Minako knew that this would be her life now, but she didn't mind. Being able to fatten up to her hearts content with no downsides was what she has wanted for a very long time. In just ten minutes, she was 100 pounds heavier, and an hour, 600 pounds heavier! There seemed to be no slowing down on both her gain and Aigis' gain.

From here though...
11213121.title: Minako had made it to weighing a ton... and more!

1122.content:
Minako has always been chubby.

But since when?
1122.title: She's always been chubby

choices: While dating Akihiko, Minako discovers that he like his girls a bit...meatier
Arcana Hierophant casts a special status effect on her, effecting her metabolism
1123.content: How else can the slightly canon female Protagonist gain a belly as bubbly as her personality?
1123.title: Another Reason

choices: Ask him now, this is just too weird!
Confront him about it at school tomorrow.
11231.content:
It was a cool autumn morning over Iwatodai Dorm, the Sunday of September 6th, 2009. While most Japanese Students went into the city on Sundays, many to do lots of fun activities with their friends, the teenagers that made up the numbers of S.E.E.S were not like most Japanese Students. This Sunday was one the had been proceeded by one of the most strenuous "Full Moon Operations" that they've underwent to date...everyone in the dorm was exhausted. This included their field leader, Minako Arisato, who was ordinarily bouncing with so much energy that you could easily mistake her for a field mouse on crack. But today, she had her face buried deeply into her pillow, drool comically leaking from her mouth and off the side.

Even though her alarm clock had rang out at least 4 times, Minako was still fast asleep. Not even heavy construction or even a nuke going off could wake the red-headed girl...but a nuke was nothing compared to the wrath of Mitsuru Kirijo. Without any regard for privacy, Mitsuru slammed open Minako's Door, the knob thudding against the wall. Even if the noise didn't wake her, when her door opened, Minako instantly jumped out from her covers, hair disheveled and pajama shirt partially unbuttoned. She stared wide-eyed to her left, Mitsuru standing in the door frame. At this point, Minako had been apart of S.E.E.S long enough to sense when the imposing 3rd was not happy, so she was on full alert. As Minako shifted from her bed and onto the floor, Mitsuru began to speak.
"Arisato! Can you care to explain why you were still in your room, sleeping while it's currently 11 in the morning?"
"Um...", Minako hesitated, " 'Cus it's a Sunday? And we also got back from an operation last night, as everyone was really-"

"Everyone?!", Mitsuru retorted, eyes gazing at the shorter red-head, "When you say 'everyone', you don't mean to say the entire team was exhausted, do you? Because if I can recall correctly, It is just yourself, Iori, and Akihiko who consistantly sleep in late! You and Iori because you two stay up playing Video Games, even on School nights! And Akihiko because...sigh he insists on training on his punching bag for hours into the night..." Mitsuru's eyelids lowered upon mentioning her good friends childish attribute..."Regardless!", she continued, "Since I have already taken the liberty of awakening Iori, saving you the trouble of looking into the trash pile he calls a room, someone needs to get Akihiko to wake up! I would do it myself but..." Mitsuru paused for a moment, shifting her body, looking off to the side while gripping her arm in a typical fashion for her, "I do not think he would appreciate me invading his privacy in such a manner..."

With an additional 20 seconds of awkward silence, Minako sat up from her bed and approached her closet, shifting through her casual shirts as she picked her outfit for the day. Taking an orange sweater of it hanger, Mitsuru broke the silence, "However!", she bellowed, startling Minako, causing her to slip and fall on the cold floor, one are already through the sweater. Looking up, she was greeted by Mitsuru's finger pointed at her. "I know you are already in a rather intimate relationship with Akihiko, so it would be no problem for you to infiltrate his room in order to awaken him, correct?"

Minako, still on the floor, tried to respond to the request. "Um, yeah, I guess I could-" Mitsuru again interrupted her. "Trei Bien! I'll be counting on you, see to it that he is up within the hour. Farewell." Before she could even blink, Mitsuru had shut Minako's door as quickly as she'd opened it. Minako was left on her bedroom floor, wondering exactly what she did to deserve this. Taking her new assignment in stride, she sat up from the floor and finished getting dressed.

Her outfit picked out and her disposition back to the cheery norm, Minako emerged from her room and ran down the stairs to Akihiko's room. Walking down the hall, the door to Junpei's room was wide open..."I really don't see what the big deal is. It's only a little dirty, so what?", Minako thought, briefly peering in before she continued on her way. Arriving at Akihiko's Door, Minako did the proper thing and gave a few knocks before barging in like Mitsuru had done. knock knock knock "Akihiko, sweetie, it's time to get uuuu~p!"

......There was no response. Being a bit more forceful with her knocking, Minako tried again. KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK "Aki, come on, It's almost noon! You'll miss the morning special at Hagukure, and I know how much you love that!" ......Still no response. Minako couldn't believe it. "Wow, even at the mention of half price beef bowls, he's not up yet...that normally works."

She then turned the knob of the door, finding it unlocked. Slowly pushing, the door creaked open. Mitsuru was right to let her wake Akihiko up, as she'd been in her a number of times already. And from her previous experience, she also knew Akihiko slept naked...And there, on the bed that her and Akihiko had shared at least 2 'tender moments' on, layed Akihiko. Carefully approaching the bed, Minako crouched to quiet her steps. "He's always so cute when he mumbles in his sleep...I'll just have listen real quick", Minako thought, as came close to his still sleeping head. Here, she listened to his tired mumbling, things involving training, something about Shinjiro seeing what he did, the usual. But about 2 minutes into her listening, Akihiko began to shift in his covers, his legs buckling and his hands were...squeezing his pillow? Minako didn't know what to make of this...she'd never him do this before....but it was what came out of Akihiko's mouth that surprised her most.

Now almost fondling his pillow, Akihiko mumbled several strange things, things like "Uggh...yeah Minako-chan...you're so soft, agh!" and "Your belly makes such a good pillow, ya know...so plump and warm" and most shockingly "Mmmmh...I love you so much, Minako-chan...I love that you did this for me...makes our cuddles so much softer..."

Minako...didn't quite get what she was hearing..."Soft? Plump and...warm? Cuddles...did it for him?", she went over the strange phrase again in her head. This was just too much for her to process...did Akihiko, the Akihiko that was so obsessed with fitness it was a second language to him...like fat girls? No...that can't be. But as Akihiko's girlfriend, she had to know for sure. As she jostled him awake, she thought about asking him right then and there....she ended up:
11231.title: Early Morning Revelations

11233.content: A bunch of mysterious new Shadows starts attacking girls and fattening them up.....and poor Minako gets the brunt of of one of them.
11233.title: More Choices

choices: The next floor split into two corridors.
The next floor was that of a Guardian floor.
112331.content:
(This is an alternative version of P3P, female route. The are a few minor changes, but the only major one is the inclusion of the Hunger Acarina.)

The Dark Hour. A hidden part of the night, when humans are locked within coffins and Shadows, the suppressed parts of human psyche, roam free and attack anyone they find.
Anyone hurt by them in the Dark Hour is cursed to experience Apathy Syndrome, left unmoving, and uncaring about everything, including themselves.

Luckily, there were those willing and able to fight off the threat of the Shadows. The Special Extracurricular Execution Squad, or SEES for short, was a group dedicated to dealing with the Shadow threat.
See, not everyone was trapped in a coffin when the Dark Hour came. Those that could move during this time had the power to fight back; they just didn’t know it yet.
They had the power of a Persona; ones mask that they used to hide their trues selves away from everyday society, a tamed Shadow. The members of SEES used these Personas to fight back the Shadows.
Backed by the Kirijo Group, a powerful company who wished to eliminate the Shadows as well, SEES attacked the Shadows at their source: a massive twisted tower made from buildings that only showed within the Dark Hour;
Tartarus.
This massive Shadow hive, located on the grounds of at Gekkoukan High School during nighttime, contained millions of Shadows, and 12 powerful Shadows, named after Major Acarina of the Tarot, that (theroitcally) if defeated, would destroy the Dark Hour.
So far, operating out of a dorm building close to (and attending) Gekkoukan, and thus Tartarus, SEES had defeated the Priestess on May 9th, the Emperor and Empress on June 8th, the Hierophant on July 7th, the Lovers, July 7th, and the Chariot and Justice, August 6th. 7 down, 5 to go.
But Tartarus was not a stable place......and there were Shadows deep within that didn’t follow the rules the SEES knew of. Things were about to swell out of control....
————
P3WG
————
At the current moment, a party of 4 SEES agents was making their way up Tartarus. This small but elite group consisted of:
-Kotone Shiomi, nicknamed Minako by her teammates, a brown haired, crimson eyed bubbly girl full of emotion and kindness, an insane hunger, and terrible worries and memories of losing those she loved.
Her Persona was Orpheus, but she had the rare ability to take on multiple Personas, which made her a valuable asset to SEES.
-Junpei Iori, a boisterous fool of a boy with a mean swing, who behind his immaturity and grey eyes, hid self-loathing and feelings of uncertainty for his future and great feelings of uselessness.
His Persona was Hermes, herald of the Roman Gods.
-Ken Amada, a young boy who was rather mature for his age....for a good reason. Though no-one besides him knew, he joined SEES to get revenge for his mother, who was accidentally killed by one of their members, Shinjiro. This quest for revenge was all that he had in mind for his future...
His Persona was Nemesis, Roman God of Revenge.
-Koromaru, a albino Shiba Inu who is very loyal to those he considers friends. His former master was a monk, and Koromaru protected his shrine even after the monk passed away, even from unnatural threats. At times,he displays human levels of intelligence.
His Persona was Cerberus, the three headed Guard Dog of the Underworld.

As the four made their way up the newly opened floors of Tartarus, not much was discussed between them, as the Shadows here were strong, and people occasionally wandered in, so they had to save them. But as they made their way to the next floor......they found a surprise.

It wasn't a big deal during the normal parts of her life but it was certainly a problem when she fought shadows. Not only was the feeling of her breasts jiggling very distracting but they were jiggling while the other members of S.E.E.S. were around. Yukari had a huge bubble butt that was just as jiggly as her gut. Each cheek was big and soft and would completely fill up any chair she sat down on, with some of her flab even spilling off the sides. Since one's persona was the manifestation of one's subconscious, Yukari's persona, Io, was just as fat as her and had the same body shape as her. While her having an obese persona was perfectly logical, it was a bit of a shock to Mitsuru, Akihiko, Minako, and Junpei, as each of their respective persona had a very slim body. "So, you up for another round?" Yukari said, tending to her swollen middle.

"Oof, no way. UUURRRP! I couldn't eat another bite." Minako answered, giving her tummy a few rubs. "Man, you can really pack it away."

"I'm actually pretty stuffed myself. UUUURRRP!" Yukari said as she idly drummed her fingers along her tummy. "Really, I'm shocked by how much you ate. You're a lot slimmer then me and you still kept up."

Of course, this did not in the slightest deter Mitsuru from being taking seriously. She still displayed an incredible amount of elegance and grace.

Despite her obesity, Mitsuru was a fit and very capable fighter. Spending so much time fighting shadows (and performing the art of swordplay) resulted in the redhead's body adapting to her weight. It was quite the sight seeing Mitsuru masterfully perform elegant and graceful sword moves as her entire jiggled.

"Heh, I guess that's true." Yukari said. "So, since we're both done eating, do you wanna watch TV or something?" Yukari wasn't close with Mitsuru but since everyone else besides her and Mitsuru was off doing their own thing, she might as well hang out with her.

"Sure. UUURRRP! Excuse me. Though I'm not sure if my tastes will go along well with yours." Mitsuru answered, drumming her fingers along her stomach.

"Don't worry about it. We'll just see if there's anything good on" Yukari replied. "And if there isn't, I'm sure we can find a bad movie to watch."

"Why would –URP- we want to watch a bad movie?" Mitsuru asked, a quizzical look on her face.

"You know how me, Junpei, and Minato get together after school and watch TV or play some video games? Sometimes me, Junpei, and Minato find an unbelievably bad movie and we laugh at it together." Yukari explained. "I've gotta say, Junpei's got a knack for finding some really bad ones."

"I see." Mitsuru said. "That's sounds fun. Would it be alright if I joined you three next time?"

"Sure, no problem. I'll have to ask them if If they're okay with it but I doubt they'll mind."

"Thank you, Takeba."

Yukari and Mitsuru then got up, with a bit of difficulty in the redhead's case, and walked over to the couch. Yukari couldn't help but notice how much Mitsuru's belly, ass, and breasts jiggled.

They then sat down and watched TV as Mitsuru continued to tend to her belly.
1412.title: Massive Mitsuru

Minako is a bad influence on his diet

info.brief_description: The members of S.E.E.S. are starting to get chubby.
info.description:
The members of S.E.E.S. are starting to get chubby and you decide how.

Rules

1. Nothing other then weight gain, stuffing, a little messiness, and burping.

2. Don't kill off anyone.

3. Please make sure your spelling and grammar is good.

4. No instant weight gain.

5. Don't have anyone reach an impossible weight.
